scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack dna/workdir
scripts.build:chaperone-mainnet: npm run build:webcomponents && npm run build:webapp-chaperone && PLACE_CHAPERONE_SERVER_URL='https://devnet-chaperone.holo.host' npm run package -w place-chaperone
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && npm run build:webcomponents && npm t -w tests
scripts.prepare-test: npm run clean:hc & npm run build:webcomponents && npm run build:webapp
scripts.devtest: npm run prepare-test && npm run start:agent
scripts.devtest:we: npm run prepare-test && npm run devtest -w we-applet
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate dna/workdir/place.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a place network mdns
scripts.start:happ-proxied: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate dna/workdir/place.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a place network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic -p=kitsune-proxy://SYVd4CF3BdJ4DS7KwLLgeU3_DbHoZ34Y-qroZ79DOs8/kitsune-quic/h/165.22.32.11/p/5779/--
scripts.start:chaperone: cross-env HC_PORT=33735 ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run dev:libs" "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w place-chaperone"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=33735 ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run dev:libs" "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w place"
scripts.start:agent-proxied: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run dev:libs" "npm run start:happ-proxied" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w place"
scripts.start:agent:playground: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run playground" "npm run dev:libs" "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w place"
scripts.start-proxied: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @place/elements && cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "npm run start:happ-proxied" "npm run start -w place"
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.network-proxied: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent-proxied"
scripts.network-playground: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent:playground"
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run build:webcomponents && npm run build:webapp && npm run package -w place
scripts.dist: cd electron && npm run tsc && npm run dist
scripts.dist-linux: cd electron && npm run tsc && npm run dist-linux
scripts.electron: npm run package && npm run start -w place-app
